1.0.0.en: Initial version introducing a condition card for monitoring zone inactivity

1.0.1.en: Fixed an issue that caused incorrect determination of the zone activity state

1.1.0.en: Introduced the Virtual Motion Trigger device

1.2.0.en: Added a condition card to check for turned on devices in a specific zone

1.3.0.en: Added a condition card to evaluate a sensor capability for devices in a specific zone

1.4.0.en: Replaced the flow card 'zone-inactive-for-minutes' (deprecated) with a new one that can be used inversely

1.4.1.en: Update flow card argument titles and placeholders

1.4.3.en: Added the "Always on" option to the Virtual Motion Trigger device

1.5.0.en: Added the trigger card for any device turned on/off

1.5.3.en: Resolved an issue that caused a crash when triggering a flow with untranslatable device classes
